metadata.title: Something went wrong!
metadata.description: Please try again or access the page after some time.

metadata.title: 403 Forbidden
metadata.description: You are not authorized to access this page.

metadata.title: 401 Unauthorized
metadata.description: You are not logged in  to access this page.

metadata.title: 404 Not Found
metadata.description: The URL may have been changed or the page may have been deleted.

metadata.title: Top
metadata.description: LEAPS is an interactive web application developed to enable the design of high-performance protein sequences, even from a small amount of experimental data. It features a simple, user-friendly interface that requires no complex operations, making it accessible to anyone.

auth.notice:
By continue, you agree to our
<link>terms</link> and <link>privacy</link>.

success.title: Verify your email.
success.description: We sent you a login link. Be sure to check your spam too.

error.title: Something went wrong.
error.description: Your sign in request failed. Please try again.

success.title: Verify your email.
success.description: We sent you a sign up link. Be sure to check your spam too.

error.title: Something went wrong.
error.description: Your sign up request failed. Please try again.

step1.title: Step1. Disclose Infomation
step1.description: To prevent unintended use of LEAPS, we ask for disclosure of information.

question.title: Questions
question.description: This form asks whether the amino acid sequence you submit is derived from toxic or pathogenic sources.

items.toxin: Is the amino acid sequence you will submit derived, in whole or in part, from a toxin?
items.pathogen: Is the amino acid sequence you will submit derived, in whole or in part, from any of the pathogens listed <link>here</link>?
items.virus: Is the amino acid sequence you will submit derived from a virus that is replication-competent and/or infectious, or otherwise capable of replicating within a host on its own?

consent.title: Consent
consent.description: This form confirms the consents required for using LEAPS. If you agree to all items.

compliance.title: I agree to legal compliance
compliance.description: The synthesis and use of proteins related to toxicity or pathogenicity will comply with the laws of the jurisdiction where the work is conducted and the appropriate laboratory biosafety level.

disclaimer.title: I agree to the disclaimer
disclaimer.description: iGEM TSUKUBA will not be liable for any losses or disadvantages resulting from the synthesis of such proteins.

warranty.title: I agree to the no-warranty terms
warranty.description: LEAPS is a research support tool for goal-directed functional modification and does not guarantee any output, regardless of what sequences are produced.

step2.title: step2. Upload Dataset
step2.description: Upload a CSV file containing proteins and experimental values for each protein.

id.required: The header of the first column must be 'id'.

sequence.required: The header of the second column must be 'sequence'.
sequence.invalid_format: The 'sequence' must be a standard amino acid sequence.

step2.required_id: The header of the first column must be 'id'.
step2.required_sequence: The header of the second column must be 'sequence'.
step2.too_few_headers: Experimental values must be at least 1 column.
step2.too_many_headers: Experimental values must be at most 5 columns.

step3.title: step3. Configure Optimization
step3.description: Set the optimization direction for each experimental value.
step3.invalid_range: Lower must be less than Upper.

step4.title: step4. Advanced Settings
step4.description: Change the settings of each module. This step is optional.

sampler.title: Sampler
sampler.description: Sampler is a module that samples proteins.

window_sizes.title: Window Sizes
window_sizes.invalid_format: Must be a comma-separated list of integers.

predictor.title: Predictor
predictor.description: Predictor is a module that predicts the functional values of proteins.

evaluator.title: Evaluator
evaluator.description: Evaluator is a module that screens proteins.

generator.title: Generator
generator.description: Generator is a module that generates new proteins.

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.invalid_format: Must be a standard amino acid sequence.

early_stopper.title: Early Stopper
early_stopper.description: Early Stopper is a module that stops the process early.

runner.title: Runner
runner.description: Runner is a module that manages each module.

empty_placeholder.title: No search results found
empty_placeholder.description: Please try searching with different keywords.

pending.title: The task is pending.
pending.description: Your task has been added to the queue. Processing will begin once computing resources are allocated. This may take a few minutes. Please wait.

running.title: The task is running.
running.description: Your task is being processed on the server. When it finishes, an email will be sent to your registered address. This may take up to several days. Please wait.

succeeded.title: The task has completed.
succeeded.description: The task finished successfully. Please check the table below for the outputs. If you run into any issues, contact <link>Support</link>.

failed.title: The task failed.
failed.description: The task has failed. Please review your dataset and parameters, then try again. If you continue to have problems, contact <link>Support</link>.

canceled.title: The task was canceled.
canceled.description: The task was canceled successfully. Any generated artifacts will be deleted automatically. If you have any questions, contact <link>Support</link>.

search.title: Search Project
search.description: Enter keywords to search in the project.

rename.title: Rename Project
rename.description: Enter a new name for the project.

share.title: Share Project
share.description: Copy the link to share the project.

delete.title: Are you sure you want to delete this post?
delete.description: If you delete this post, it will be permanently removed and cannot be recovered.

name.title: Name
name.too_short: Must be at least 3 characters long.

rename.title: Project Renamed
rename.description: The project has been successfully renamed.

delete.title: Project Deleted
delete.description: The project has been successfully deleted.

run.title: Project Started
run.description: The project has been successfully started.

create.title: Something went wrong.
create.description: Your project create failed. Please try again.

upload.title: Something went wrong.
upload.description: Your file upload failed. Please try again.

download.title: Something went wrong.
download.description: Your file download failed. Please try again.

copy.title: Something went wrong.
copy.description: Your code copy failed. Please try again.

rename.title: Something went wrong.
rename.description: Your project rename failed. Please try again.

delete.title: Something went wrong.
delete.description: Your project delete failed. Please try again.

run.title: Something went wrong.
run.description: Your project run failed. Please try again.

email.subject: Email Verification
email.title: Email Verification
email.description:
Your email verification has been received. ðŸŽ‰
Thank you for using our service.
To access our services, you need to verify your email address.
email.instruction: Click the button below to complete your email verification. Please make sure to verify within 24 hours.
email.warning:
If you did not request this email, it may have been sent by mistake. Please ignore and delete this email.

The verification link is valid for 24 hours. If it expires, please request verification again.
email.support: For support, please contact us at <link>support@{domain}</link>.
